name: TrinityReformedPresbyterian
0:
”Alexa, open Trinity Reformed Presbyterian”
”Alexa, ask Trinity Reformed Presbyterian for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start Trinity Reformed Presbyterian”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trinity reformed presbyterian
des:
Listen to the latest sermons from Trinity Reformed Presbyterian Church in Union County, North Carolina. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
You can visit us at our website: https://www.trinityreformedpres.com/
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
